SELECT Barazkide_Event.* FROM Barazkide_Event jOIN Barazkide_Garden ON Barazkide_Event.gardenId=Barazkide_Garden.gardenId JOIN Barazkide_Following ON Barazkide_Garden.gardenId=Barazkide_Following.gardenId WHERE Barazkide_Following.userId = ? AND Barazkide_Event.creategDate < ?
ORDER BY Barazkide_Event.creategDate DESC
